words.definition: An Aborigine is a native of Australia before Europeans lived there.
words.example: The Aborigines created beautiful artwork.

words.definition: To ban something is to not let people do it.
words.example: Smoking is banned in this building.

words.definition: If you are cautious, you are careful in a dangerous situation.
words.example: Be cautious when you are crossing the street.

words.definition: To confess is to say that you did something wrong or bad.
words.example: He confessed to stealing the money.

words.definition: A cottage is a small, old-fashioned house.
words.example: They stayed in a little cottage near the beach.

words.definition: Daytime is the time of day when there is light from the sun.
words.example: I prefer to work during the daytime.

words.definition: If you are desperate, you are in a very difficult situation and need help.
words.example: He was desperate for money after losing his job.

words.definition: To fade is to become less bright or strong.
words.example: The color of the shirt faded after many washes.

words.definition: If a person or animal is fierce, they are angry or violent.
words.example: Wolves are fierce animals. Do not disturb them.

words.definition: To gamble means to play a game that involves winning or losing money.
words.example: Many people like to go to casinos to gamble.

words.definition: A lawn is an area of grass in a garden or park.
words.example: He mowed the lawn on Saturday.

words.definition: To mow is to cut grass with a machine.
words.example: He has to mow the grass every week.

words.definition: An outlaw is a person who has broken the law and is hiding from the police.
words.example: The outlaws robbed the bank and ran away.

words.definition: A prospect is the possibility that something will happen in the future.
words.example: There is a good prospect of a job for him.

words.definition: A purse is a small bag where women keep their money and other things.
words.example: She lost her purse on the bus.

words.definition: A rod is a long, thin piece of wood or metal.
words.example: He used a fishing rod to catch a fish.

words.definition: If something seldom happens, it does not happen often.
words.example: It seldom rains in the desert.

words.definition: To shave is to cut the hair on your face or body close to the skin.
words.example: He shaves every morning before work.

words.definition: If you are terrified, you are very scared.
words.example: She was terrified of the big dog.

words.definition: A wizard is a man who has magic powers.
words.example: The wizard used his magic to help the people.
